newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Amsterdam anarchists fight with flowers.
newsitem.headline: Amsterdam anarchists fight with flowers.

text.p: Protesting punks and skinheads pelted police and each other with potplants at the end of an anti-European Union demonstration in Amsterdam on Tuesday.

Around 1,000 demonstrators, waving banners proclaiming "Amsterdamned" and "Europe - welcome to the Fourth Reich", had earlier marched through the city, where an EU summit is underway, under heavy police guard.

Arriving at the central Dam square, the protesters made short work of a large decorative flower display, with black-hooded anarchists and punks hurling greenery in all directions, watched by crowds of bemused summer tourists.
The more hippie element among the demonstrators could be seen busily salvaging trays of flowers from the destruction.
"Come on, that's stealing," a policeman weakly protested to a dreadlocked man cycling past laden with blooms.
"I'm saving their life, man" was the reply.
